<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"limit","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Nombre de cycles à retourner","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"offset","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Nombre de cycles à ignorer","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"fromDate","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Date de début (YYYY-MM-DD)","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"toDate","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Date de fin (YYYY-MM-DD)","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Historique récupéré avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"periods":{"description":"Liste des cycles/règles","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant du cycle","example":"cycle_123456789"},"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Date de début des règles","example":"2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"periodLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée des règles en jours","example":5},"cycleLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée totale du cycle en jours","example":28},"isRegular":{"type":"boolean","description":"Cycle régulier","example":true},"flowIntensity":{"type":"number","description":"Intensité du flux moyenne","example":3},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Notes sur ce cycle","example":"Cycle normal, pas de complications"}},"required":["id","startDate","isRegular"],"title":"PeriodDto"}},"total":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre total de cycles","example":12},"averageCycleLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée moyenne du cycle","example":28.5},"averagePeriodLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée moyenne des règles","example":5.2},"regularityPercentage":{"type":"number","description":"Pourcentage de cycles réguliers","example":85.5}},"required":["periods","total","averageCycleLength","averagePeriodLength","regularityPercentage"],"title":"PeriodsHistoryResponseDto"}}}}}}
 id="cycle-controller-get-periods-history-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
